forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 31. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 15. Northwest wind 9 to 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston today, the sun radiates brightly, casting a warm glow over the city's landscapes, while a robust west wind dances through the streets, creating an invigorating chill in the air. Despite the winds gusting to a formidable strength, the clarity of the day invites a sense of optimism, urging residents outdoors to embrace the crispness that late winter offers. As the day progresses, temperatures will peak around the thirty-first degree mark, but as night approaches, a cool embrace brings temperatures down to the low teens, so preparations for the evening might be prudent.

Dress in layers; a sturdy coat will serve you well against the brisk wind, while a cozy scarf can shield your neck from the chill. A pair of comfortable boots may be a wise choice, making it easier to navigate through any remnants of snow lingering on the sidewalks. With the weather being so pleasant, perhaps a stroll along the Charles River will refresh the spirit, or a visit to a charming café, where a steaming cup of something warm can be savored while watching the world go by. Today holds the promise of simple pleasures in the heart of winter's waning days.
